name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

name: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter navigates the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

name: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town uncover government secrets and supernatural forces while searching for their missing friend.

name: The Crown
description: A dramatization of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the political and personal events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

name: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys toward his destiny in a turbulent world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

name: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

name: Chernobyl
description: A dramatization of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster and the bureaucratic fallout that followed.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' plans the biggest heist in recorded history to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.
